text:
November IS* 1957
Miss Helen Lochrie
TV Coordinator
Board of Education,
Memphis City Schools
317 Poplar Avenue
Memphis 3* Tennessee
Dear Miss Lochrie:
Thank you for your letter of November 8 * I don't believe we have any
material dealing specifically with the types of television sets used in
classrooms* However, X am enclosing an Index of our NAEB Research
FACT SHEET Bulletins and also a list of our materials which are avail¬
able . Perhaps you will find something listed in one of these pamphlets
which will be of help to you*
Our Fact Sheets sell for ten cents fach or $2.50 per year with the sub¬
scription running from January to January* The prices for our other
various materials are listed along with a general description of the
article.
Please let us know if we may help you. I'm sorry we couldn't do more
for you at this time *
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
Enclosures (2)
